snippet: Few tourist destinations are as exotic and unsafe as Afghanistan, where people still visit in dwindling numbers.
abstract: Some tourists still go to Afghanistan, despite warnings from American government about risks of kidnapping and explicit threat from Taliban that they will target anyone who is from a country that is part of NATO-led coalition.
lead_paragraph: Few tourist destinations are as exotic and unsafe as Afghanistan, where people still visit in dwindling numbers.
